mapper.select: select * from certificate where ind_id=#{id} order by cer_sdate
mapper.update: insert into certificate (cer_no, ind_id, cer_name, cer_sdate, cer_edate, cer_host) values (certificate_seq.nextval, #{indId}, #{cerName}, #{cerSdate}, #{cerEdate}, #{cerHost})
update certificate set cer_name=#{cerName}, cer_sdate=#{cerSdate}, cer_edate=#{cerEdate}, cer_host=#{cerHost} where cer_no=#{cerNo}
